# PED::SET_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE_LOOPED

## Summary
Set the looping state of a synchronized scene. .

## Parameters
* **INT** sceneID: The scene index returned by CREATE_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE
* **BOOL** loop: True to loop the scene, false otherwise

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Use this command to set the loopiung state of a synchronised scene after it has been created.
